20110121063650.000|20110121063651.000|CC1|FIGHTER.                        
20110121063651.000|20110121063652.000|CC1|>> Jon: WE'RE NUMBER ONE!       
20110121063652.000|20110121063656.000|CC1|(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)           
20110121063656.000|20110121063658.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, JON, THE ULTIMATE

20110121063659.000|20110121063701.000|CC1|HAVE HAD THIS TECHNOLOGY TO MAKE
20110121063701.000|20110121063701.000|CC1|STEALTH PLANES FOR YEARS.

20110121063703.000|20110121063705.000|CC1|GIFT SHOP OF THE INTREPID TO BUY

20110121063710.000|20110121063711.000|CC1|IN CHINA."                      
20110121063711.000|20110121063715.000|CC1|(LAUGHTER)                      
20110121063715.000|20110121063716.000|CC1|>> Jon: SO PERHAPS WE DON'T HAVE
20110121063716.000|20110121063717.000|CC1|MUCH TO FEAR FROM CHINA'S
